CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 21, 1953, pg. 11 reads: "Charming Guest And Party - Entertaining for her charming mother, Mrs. Katheryn Madison, of White Sulphur, W.Va., last Thursday, was lovely Lorena Bowler, who gathered this group of Pittsburgh socialites at her home for bridge. Seated are Mrs. Frankie Conrad, Mrs. Madison, the honored guests [sic]; Lorena, and Mrs. Jayne McDaniel.  Standing are Mmes. Susie McNeal, Lula Howell, Myrtle Britton, Maude Jones, Elizabeth Henderson, Maybella Nunn, Lottie Dugger and Ada Rickmond. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, seated: Frankie Conrad, guest of honor Katheryn Madison, Lorena Bowler, and Jayne McDaniel; standing: Susie McNeal, Lula Howell, Myrtle Britton, Maude Jones, Elizabeth Henderson, Maybella Nunn, Lottie Dugger, and Ada Rickmond, posed in home of Lorena Bowler for bridge party, another version
